title.narrative: Integrated Project for Source Sustainability and Climate Resilient Rain-fed Agriculture in Himachal Pradesh

description.narrative: To improve upstream watershed management and increase agricultural water productivity in selected Gram Panchayats in Himachal Pradesh.
